resources.string: Press and hold the Camera button to take pictures continuously.
Hold the device steady while taking pictures.
Ratio one by one, %1$s megapixels, resolution %2$d by %3$d
Create animated images by taking pictures continuously.
Unable to take pictures in Anti-fog mode. Not enough light.
Automatically corrects pictures for fog when taking them in the mist.
Take selfie shots and apply various effects, such as an airbrushed effect.
Take the best possible pictures by setting the device to adjust the exposure and color of pictures automatically.
Take portrait pictures with an airbrushed effect.

"Create your own video clips without any editing tools. You can easily share created videos via your social network accounts. The following recording types are available.
Collage: Create a video collage by selecting a grid layout and recording several videos of the same length in either 4:3 or 1:1 aspect ratio. Slow motion: Record a video that will be divided into a selected number of sections with one playing at normal speed and the others in slow motion. This feature is only available while using the rear camera."

Create your own video clips without any editing tools. You can easily share created videos via your social network accounts. The following recording types are available. Collage, Create a video collage by selecting a grid layout and recording several videos of the same length in either 4 by 3 or one by one aspect ratio. Slow motion, Record a video that will be divided into a selected number of sections with one playing at normal speed and the others in slow motion. This feature is only available while using the rear camera.
Take pictures continuously by pressing and holding the Camera button.
Take pictures and record videos in a variety of styles using the front and rear cameras at the same time.
Take pictures and tag them with the current location and weather information.
Record videos for viewing in fast motion. You can play a specific section of each video in fast motion after recording it.
Take pictures that emphasize the vivid colors of food.
Create your own time lapse video by recording at various frame rates. The frame rate will be automatically adjusted depending on the scene being recorded and the movement of the device.
Broadcast live on YouTube. Share your link with friends so they can watch your video in real time.

"Use various functions with your burst shots after you take them. The following functions are available in %s: Best photo: Select the best from a series of pictures. Best face: Select the best picture of each person from a series of pictures. Drama: Take a series of pictures of a moving object, then merge them. Eraser: Erase unwanted moving objects from your picture. Panning shot: Capture a sense of motion when taking pictures of moving objects."
Take multiple shots and combine them to get brighter, clearer pictures in low light without using the flash.
Create a panorama by taking consecutive pictures in either a horizontal or vertical direction.
Take a picture of a product and search for related products.
Adjust the ISO sensitivity, exposure value and white balance manually while taking pictures.
Adjust the exposure value, shutter speed, ISO sensitivity, white balance, focal length, and color tone manually while taking pictures.
Take multiple shots in various exposures and combine them to create soft and rich colors.
Change the focus of pictures after they have been taken. You can focus on subjects near to the camera, far away from the camera, or both.
Record videos at a high frame rate for viewing in slow motion. You can play a specific section of each video in slow motion after recording it.
The rear camera will automatically detect and focus on your face when you take self-portrait pictures.
Take clearer pictures of fast moving subjects.
Enrich your pictures by adding a few seconds of background sound.
Take wide-angle selfie shots to fit more people into your pictures.
Tap an object less than 20 inches away to focus on it, then tap the Camera button to take a picture.
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a WLAN.
Pictures taken while recording video will appear slightly zoomed out compared to the video because of the video stabilization algorithm.
Unable to find application to perform this action.
Unable to open %s. Only apps added to Home screen can be used in Maximum power saving mode.
Use the Active key to take pictures and use either of the Volume keys to record videos.
Close Camera. Battery temperature too low.
Exit Camera. Battery temperature too high.
Unable to record. Resolution type not supported by memory card.
Burst shots not supported in low light conditions.
You cannot use more than one application that uses Camera at the same time. Camera will close.
Security policy restricts use of Camera.
Unable to record videos during call.
Unable to use Camera during calls.
Unable to open Camera during video calls.
Unable to save file to SD card. Default storage has been changed to device memory.
Hold the device steady until it finishes taking the picture.
The default storage location will be changed to the SD card. However, burst shots and pictures taken using some downloaded camera modes will still be saved to the device storage.
Not enough memory. Default storage is changed to memory card.
The following will be unavailable while the device storage is full:
Not enough space on SD card. Default storage has been changed to device storage.
The recording of your video collage is still in progress. Tap SAVE to save the recording and leave the recording screen.
The recording of your video collage is still in progress. Tap CONTINUE to continue the current recording, or tap NEW to start a new recording.
Ratio one by one, grid 2 by one
Ratio one by one, grid one by 2
Ratio one by one, grid 3 by one
Ratio one by one, grid 2 by 2
Ratio one by one, grid one by one
Ratio 4 by 3, grid one by one
Turn off USB storage before using camera.
Unable to open %1$s while the S View Cover is closed. Open the cover, open %2$s, then allow the relevant permissions.
Unable to use Location tags while the S View Cover is closed. Open the cover, open Camera, then allow the relevant permissions and try again.
Unable to open Camera while the S View Cover is closed. Open the cover, unlock your device, open Camera, then allow the relevant permissions.
To open %s, detach keyboard cover from device.
Correct the shape of faces that appear distorted.
Unable to apply effects while recording videos.
1 face has been detected and is located in the center at the bottom of the screen.
1 face has been detected and located in center of screen.
1 face has been detected and is located in the center at the top of the screen.
1 face has been detected and is located on the lower left side of the screen.
1 face has been detected and located on left side of screen.
1 face has been detected and is located on the upper left side of the screen.
1 face has been detected and is located on the lower right side of the screen.
1 face has been detected and located on right side of screen.
1 face has been detected and is located on the upper right side of the screen.
Add an extra Camera button that you can move anywhere on the screen in Auto and Selfie modes.
Hold your hand out with your palm facing the camera to have your picture taken after a few seconds.
Swipe right to view available camera modes.
Select the mode that you want to use.
Tap the stop button to stop recording.
Tap %s to take pictures while recording video.
Tap the camera button to take pictures while recording video.

Take pictures or record videos using a variety of different effects, to suit all occasions. Only the Auto and Selfie camera modes are available, and no effects can be applied, while Easy mode is turned on.
Tap the object you want to bring into focus.
Tap %s to use the front camera. Some functions are not available when using the front camera.
Tap the camera switch button to use the front camera. Some functions are not available when using the front camera.
Press the Volume keys to take pictures.
Tap on the screen or drag the circle to move the highlighted area.
Tap the Camera button, then move the device slowly in one direction.
Tap the Camera button and swivel your device slowly in one direction.
Tap %s to view your pictures or videos right after you take or record them.
Tap the Quick view button to view your pictures or videos right after you take or record them.
The following will be unavailable while recording in %s resolutions:
Hold the device steady while taking pictures.
Tap the heart rate sensor to take a selfie once your face has been recognized.
Unable to take selfies by tapping the heart rate sensor while using a flip cover.
Insert memory card to use Camera.
Swipe up or down to switch between the front and rear cameras.
Swipe left to view available camera filters.
Swipe left to view available camera filters and watermarks.
Swipe right to view available camera modes.
Pictures taken in correct direction saved.
Unable to take virtual shot. Device not moved.
Unable to save virtual shot. Not enough pictures.
Tap the Camera button, then circle around an object while keeping it in the center of the frame.
Take %d pictures in a row after the timer reaches zero. Only the Auto, Pro, and Selfie camera modes support this function.
The Locating method will be set to %s.
To use Location tags, the following settings will be changed:
Location will be turned on and the Locating method will be set to %s.
Tap TURN ON to turn on Location tags. This will also change the following settings:
Attach, embed, and store geographical location data within each picture and video.
To turn on Location tags, Location must also be turned on in the quick settings panel.
To use Location tags, make sure Locating method is set to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks, or Wi-Fi and mobile networks.
To use Location tags, make sure Locating method is set to GPS and Wi-Fi, or Wi-Fi only.
To use Location tags, make sure Locating method is set to High accuracy or Power saving.
Unable to stop taking picture. Please wait…
Database storage space is nearly full.
Cannot use flash in low temperature.
Touch and hold, then drag to change order.

This function will attach, embed, and store geographical location data within each picture that you take or video that you record. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit, or copy these pictures and videos since they contain information about where the picture or video was taken or recorded.
Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit, or copy pictures and videos with location tags since they contain information about where the pictures or videos were taken or recorded.
Location tags will be turned on.
Record a short video clip of what happens before each picture is taken.
Unable to use Motion photo while applying effects.
No images or videos to select.
Unable to record videos. Not enough space in device storage.
Unable to take pictures. Not enough space in device storage.
Cannot zoom in or out in this mode.
Hold your hand out with your palm facing the camera to have your picture taken after a few seconds.
Unable to take pictures in Panorama mode. Not enough scenery detail.
"Allow some of %s's features to use network connections and access the following data:"
"Save a compressed (JPEG) and RAW copy of each picture you take in Pro mode. Burst shots can't be saved as RAW files."
Unable to use flash. Battery power low.
Cannot view QR code or barcode content while screen locked with secure screen lock type. Unlock screen and try again to view content.
Failed to read QR code. Try again.
Camera has been opened via Quick launch.
Pressing the Home key quickly twice opens Camera. To turn off this function, tap TURN OFF.
Open Camera by quickly pressing the Home key twice.
Both RAW and JPG files will be saved in device storage.
Unable to use Save RAW and JPEG files while color tone applied.
Recording will be stopped and saved when you answer call.
Answering call will discard video collage.
The video codec is currently being used by other applications. Close any other active video applications in Task Manager and try again.
Unable to open %s. Tap SETTINGS, go to Application info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Unable to use Location tags. Unlock your device, open Camera, then allow the relevant permissions and try again.
Unable to open Camera from the lock screen. Unlock your device, open Camera, then allow the relevant permissions.
Taking pictures will be unavailable while recording in %s resolution.
Video stabilization will be unavailable while recording in %1$s resolution. (%2$s supports optical image stabilization only.)
View pictures immediately after you take them.
Review the picture as soon as you take it.
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, go to Application info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Unable to create the video collage. Unlock your device, then allow the relevant permissions.
Save all pictures you take as shown in the preview, not as flipped images.
Burst shots will be saved to device storage.
Tap OK to unlock your device and contact us.
Tap OK to unlock your device to download new effects.
Tap OK to unlock your device to download new modes.
Tap OK to unlock your device and use %s.
Picture saved, but unable to apply Focus contrast effect. Select area to focus on and try again.
Picture saved, but unable to apply Focus contrast effect. Subject too far away.
Picture saved, but unable to apply Focus contrast effect. Subject not detected.
Self shot available only when flip phone is open.
Self shot can only be used when the phone is open.
Drag the frame to where you want your face to appear in the picture. The device will take a picture if your face remains within the selected area for %d seconds.
Once your face has been recognized, tap the heart rate sensor to take a selfie, or hold your hand out with your palm facing the camera to have your picture taken after a few seconds.
Background sound will be recorded for up to %d seconds after you tap the Camera button.
You can keep taking pictures. Up to the previous %d seconds of recorded sound will be saved with each picture.
Burst shots and pictures taken using some downloaded camera modes will still be saved in the device storage.
Continuous shots will be saved in device storage.
An SD card has been inserted. The default storage location will be changed to the SD card.
Single shots will be saved to the SD card.

"Your device's location information will be sent to the content provider so that you can be provided with local weather information.
If you agree to this, Tag shot will be granted this permission and you will not be asked again."

This camera mode will attach, embed, and store geographical location data and weather information within each picture that you take. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit, or copy these pictures since they contain information about where the picture was taken.
To enhance TalkBack in Camera, Voice control will be turned on.
Unable to turn on the Voice guide. Turn on TalkBack and try again.
Tap the Camera button to start product recognition.
Tap the screen to take selfies easily.
Unable to turn on the flash. Try again when your device has cooled down.
Unable to record video. Try again when device cooled down.
Recording has stopped. You can record when your device has cooled down.
The flash has been turned off. You can turn on the flash when your device has cooled down.
Focus on and track a subject selected on the preview screen.
Unable to record videos with effects in %s. Change video size in Settings.
Maximum file size (%s) reached. Video saved. Recording will continue in new file.
Preview pictures and videos using the full screen.
To enhance Voice Assistant in Camera, Voice control will be turned on.
Unable to use the voice guide. Turn on Voice Assistant and try again.
Take pictures by saying “%1$s”, “%2$s”, “%3$s”, or “%4$s”, or record videos by saying “%5$s”.
More than %d faces have been detected.
%d faces have been detected. Focus is on the face in center.
%d faces have been detected. Focus is on face on left.
%d faces have been detected. Focus is on face on right.
Error occurred while merging pictures. Picture saved anyway.
Device swiveled too fast. Unable to take picture in Wide selfie mode.
Swivel your device slowly to the left or right.
Swivel your device slowly to the left.
Swivel your device slowly to the right.
Failed to take pictures in Wide selfie mode. Unable to distinguish subject.
Swivel the device to the left.
Swivel the device to the right.
